attributes.action: stop turning the u.k into the big brother nanny state before it is to late
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are being led into a situation where liberty freedom and all that we have had to be proud of the uk of is being snatched from us . we must insist that what ever the costs are tecno answers to problems that government has created , terrorism , transport , health imagration etc will be resisted .hi cost hi tech solutions to problems that do not exsist are being sold to ministers that have total disregard for the people of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
